metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42890 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability in Batik of Apache XML Graphics allows an attacker to run Java code from untrusted SVG via JavaScript. This issue affects Apache XML Graphics prior to 1.16. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.16.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-42890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbatik-java - 1.14-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: batik package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.14-2ubuntu0.1').
